snippet: Governor Christie won decisively, making impressive inroads among younger voters, blacks, Hispanics and women – all groups that Republicans nationally have struggled to attract.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie wins re-election by crushing margin, victory that vaults him to front ranks of Republican presidential contenders; win also makes him his party's foremost proponent of pragmatism over ideology; Christie makes impressive inroads among younger voters, blacks, Hispanics and women--all groups that Republicans nationally have struggled to attract.

byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Governor Christie won decisively, making impressive inroads among younger voters, blacks, Hispanics and women – all groups that Republicans nationally have struggled to attract.

headline.main: Chris Christie Coasts to 2nd Term as Governor of New Jersey
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Wins Mayor's Race In Landslide; Christie Coasts To 2nd Term as Governor
